title: The GameStop, Reddit, Robinhood saga
description:
Kara and Scott break down how amateur traders best hedge fund managers, driving up GameStop stock and what that means for the future of the stock market. They also discuss Google's PAC ending donations to congress members who voted against verifying Biden's election win.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
